rules_text: Search your library for three differently named noncreature, nonland cards with mana value 3 or less not named Chaos Is Your Redemption and exile them, then shuffle. If you exile three cards this way, cast one at random without paying its mana cost. Then shuffle the rest into your library.
flavor_text: [i]As the Abominations overwhelmed the Triumvirate, Glitch reached her breaking point.[/i]
notes: Better Hide, Better Run — Glitch Mob
